title: Aswan Hosts International Tourism Conference
description: The city welcomed experts from around the world to discuss sustainable tourism and Nile-based travel.

title: New Hospital Opens in West Aswan
description: A new state-of-the-art hospital has been inaugurated to serve residents with advanced medical care.

title: Cultural Festival Celebrates Nubian Heritage
description: Traditional music, dance, and art featured in a lively event celebrating Aswan's rich Nubian history.

title: Aswan Dam Sees Record Water Levels
description: The High Dam has recorded historically high water storage levels this season, ensuring strong irrigation support.

title: Solar Power Plant Boosts Clean Energy
description: A new solar farm has begun operations, contributing significantly to Aswanâ€™s green energy goals.

title: University Launches Nile Research Center
description: Aswan University opens a new research center focused on environmental and hydrological studies of the Nile River.
